CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Quantity > 0,Conga_Total_Sales_Price__c < ( Total_Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c + Cumulative_Indexation_amount__c + Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c + Renewal_Uplift_amount__c)),Conga_Total_Sales_Price__c - ( Total_Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c + Cumulative_Indexation_amount__c + Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c + Renewal_Uplift_amount__c), 0)
CustomField.label: Discount Amount - RA
